name: Bonsai (itch) (banedeath)
description:
Find your Zen. Relax as you prune and shape your Bonsai tree.

The bonsai tree is always growing, new branches will happen every 5 seconds, doubled for every branch.  So the next branch will happen at 15 seconds, then 35 seconds and so on.. This compounds for every branch and can get rather slow very quickly!! Use the time scale GUI in the top left to help manage the growth.  

Prune a branch by clicking on it, but be aware that the collision generated from Unity SpriteShape's is not very good (see screen shot, green outline).  Pruning a branch will cause it to fall and disappear.

Leaves will spawn every 3 to 8 seconds per branch and align upward.. 

Some branches are stubborn and defy gravity and the tree itself!  Make sure you prune those, 'cause they are not very zen (totally not a bug with constantly scaling child transforms).

Let's see what kind of awesome trees you guys make!  Use the screen shot button the top left to take a picture.
